summary: Retextures hanging herbs Elves Ear and Frost Mirriam to be a bit less terrible.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Slightly Less Terrible Hanging Herbs
Version: 1
Date: 12/25/2012
Category: Models and Textures
Author: faeriexdecay
Source: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28907

[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/28907-1-1356479932.png[/img][/center]

Description
===========
If you\'ve ever been to an inn or inside a person\'s home, you\'ll likely have seen the hanging pixel puke next to the garlic. That pixel puke is actually supposed to be herbs - Elves Ear and Frost Mirriam. Well, I\'ve attempted to make that puke texture a little easier on the eyes by increasing the resolution, sharpening, adjusting saturation and contrast, and a few other tiny tweaks. It\'s not HD. It\'s not professional. It\'s not super amazing. But I think it looks a hell of a lot less painful than vanilla.

PS: The texture size might be a bit large for something this small, so I have added an optional reduced version that is closer to vanilla\'s size for those who want to try it. Please note that these reduced textures are untested.

[b]NOTE:[/b] This mod does not retexture the garlic, only the herbs beside it. If you want the garlic texture seen in my screenshots, try [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1192]this mod[/url].

NMM Install and Uninstall
=======================
You should know what to do. :D Contains just 2 textures, so super easy and fast to add/remove with NMM.

Manual Install
=============
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Copy files to install folder - Skyrim\\Data
4. Play!

Manual Uninstall
===============
To revert to vanilla, remove these files:
Data\\textures\\plants\\herbs01.dds
Data\\textures\\plants\\herbs01_n.dds

Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to TESNexus.com for the amazing mod home.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.

Tools Used
==========
7-Zip
GIMP
Paint Shop Pro
DDSOpt

Licensing/Legal
===============
You can do whatever you want with these textures if you give me credit should you choose to redistribute any part of it.
author: faeriexdecay
